page.title: 18COMMUNICATIONS_CROSSGATES
page.content: One of the main aspects of communications in the area is the new road which starts at the Halbeath Interchange(on the M90) and goes near Cowdenbeath, Lochgelly, Cardenden, Kircaldy and finally Glenrothes.There is also another main road in the area. This is the M90 from Edinburgh to Perth and is used by many commuters. The major railway line which runs through Dunfermline, Cowdenbeath, Lochgelly, Cardenden is also used by many commuters. There are a few industries in the area including open cast mining which employs only 4O workers; Reids which is a building contractors; Crawfords-a potato merchants and a concrete block manufacturers.
